card1.data: Use automation to simplify data protection and governance by controlling identities, applications, and data across the information lifecycle

card2.card: Bolster your security posture with a next-generation SOC that combines the strength of your threat hunters with our faster-than-human machine analysis

card3.card: Micro Focus Robotic Process Automation gives you the power to build, secure, and scale automated processes, from legacy to modern, across the enterprise
